DOC.brief_summary: This phase I study analyze bioavailability pharmacodynamic two different variant oral salmon calcitonin ( SMC021 ) postmenopausal woman
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Study Oral Salmon Calcitonin Healthy Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Healthy postmenopausal woman Previous treatment osteoporosis medication Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
